title: Associate Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Helen Keller International
Interview Descriptions: Firstly, there is a written test. After the written test, the company will arrange an interview, they will contact you via phone. Make sure you pick up the call. Then go to the interview.
Interview Questions: any experience related to the work.

title: Regional Director Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Helen Keller International
Interview Descriptions: It started with an HR interview. Then there was an interview with the hiring manager.  There would have been a final interview with the head of the organization for the selected candidate to confirm organizational fit.
Interview Questions: What interests you about the position?

title: Development Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Helen Keller International in Jan 2022
Interview Descriptions: Applied online, was promptly scheduled for HR interview, then with hiring manager within a period of about 2 weeks.  About a month later the hiring manager emailed to request that I complete an assignment over the weekend.  I spent several hours of my personal time critiquing a marketing piece that had already been used.  About 3 weeks later, an HR rep contacted me to let me know they were still interviewing but would be in touch shortly to provide an update.  About 2 weeks later, I noticed the position was again promoted online. I asked the HR rep for feedback regarding my candidacy status, after a few days I was informed they had decided to not move me forward in the process. I was not expecting such a mismanaged, inefficient process from an international nonprofit organization.
Interview Questions: Basic historical experience with communications and working with vendors and managing contracts.

title: Customer Service Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Helen Keller International (Whitby, ON) in Jun 2021
Interview Descriptions: very friendly people and ask common question the meeting was through zoom and they would tell you what time the met was. understand what customer needs and want is very important

title: Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Helen Keller International in Apr 2021
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was very easy. The job description was forward and direct with responsibilities and expectations. The Interview was completed over zoom during COVID and the staff was very professional. They made me feel extremely comfortable and I was not nervous at all.
Interview Questions: What were my expectations for this position

title: Nutrition Advisor Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. I interviewed at Helen Keller International
Interview Descriptions: I was recruited by HKI for a position. They first did an informational interview and were a joy to talk to and work with. The technical interview went well, questions were more focused on processes rather than technical knowledge.
Interview Questions: Can you talk about a time you adapted a global tool to a country-specific program?

title: Help Desk Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Helen Keller International (Toronto, ON) in Jan 2021
Interview Descriptions: it was nice and smooth but it was at the same time kind of complex too but i needed time to ingest the content before anything else if you know what i mean
Interview Questions: hey man how are you tonight

title: Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Helen Keller International
Interview Descriptions: This was a pre-pandemic interview process: consisted of a total of 5 separate phone / in-person interviews, each between 30 minutes - one hour long. The hiring manager was clearly unsure of what they were looking for.
Interview Questions: This position might change slightly as time goes on, are you comfortable with that?

title: External Relations Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 months. I interviewed at Helen Keller International (New York, NY)
Interview Descriptions: Nearly two months after applying I was contacted. There were a few phone screenings and then in person interviews with individuals and panels and a test. Then they called references.
Interview Questions: What frustrates you? What are your strengths? Tell us about a time you disagreed with a boss. Tell us about a time you failed and what you learned.

title: Program Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Helen Keller International (New Haven, CT)
Interview Descriptions: Total of three interviews. One was face to face and the other two on the phone. Process was formal and relaxing at the same time. They look for you type of personality to fit in the organization plus your skills and tittle. They are very honest during the entire process.
Interview Questions: How would you make this program more sustainable?

title: Communications Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Helen Keller International
Interview Descriptions: It was a quick and easy interview. It was slightly informal and everything was wrapped up within a week altogether. The process was super smooth. They offered a short-term contract initially.

title: Grants and Contracts Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Helen Keller International (New York, NY) in Apr 2017
Interview Descriptions:
In office interview, followed by a skype call with the Washington DC office, followed by a third in office interview

The interviews themselves took place over a week and a half in order to get to the final group, but it took them an entire month and a half to tell me that I didn't get the job. I emailed them roughly every week and a half for an update and was repeatedly told to wait. In the meantime, I missed out on an opportunity at a start-up because HKI kept promising an answer and finally the start-up cancelled their offer after waiting for 3 weeks.
Interview Questions: The third interview involved possible workplace scenarios regarding the database system they use, but without experience using their system its difficult to say the answers they want.

title: Finance Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Helen Keller International (New York, NY)
Interview Descriptions: First I met with the HR director and person who I would be reporting to.  Then, I was called in for a second interview with some in G&C and the Controller.  Then a few weeks passed and I was called with an offer.

title: Finance Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Helen Keller International (Nairobi) in Jan 2016
Interview Descriptions: Very well organised,  impressive panel,  interesting conversations that made the process quite comfortable,  the panel was warm and welcoming,  quite engaging and the questions were well thought through, organised complex but well outlined
Interview Questions: Complex organised engaging and we'll presented

title: Accounting Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Helen Keller International
Interview Descriptions: The interview was very pleasant. There were three interviewers from financial department and HR department. All of them were very nice and easy-going. Generally, the process was very detailed about my experience about education( Since I was a student) and past work experiences, you know, work experience is the one of the most important leverage in job hunting. So, being familiar with your resume is the last thing you want to left.

title: Data Analyst Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Helen Keller International (Nairobi)
Interview Descriptions: I send my resume and cover letter and was later called for an interview.I met the interviewer who was very straight to the point. The interview went on very well. After a few weeks i got an acceptance  letter and after I confirmed I started the job the next week.

title: Deputy Country Director Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Helen Keller International (Washington, DC) in Jan 2014
Interview Descriptions: The hiring process was long and long people who interviewed me. The phone screen was about my suitibility for the post. The in-person and Skype interview were technical and question about program management.
